languages.text: "Ты выглядишь более умиротворенно. Завязала с ересью?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
languages.original_text: "Ты выглядишь более умиротворенно. Завязала с ересью?"

traits.locale_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"
"You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

languages.text: 「心安らかなようだな。異端信仰からは足を洗ったのか？」
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: 「心安らかなようだな。異端信仰からは足を洗ったのか？」

languages.text: « Vous semblez apaisée. Avez-vous tourné le dos à l'hérésie ? »
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous semblez apaisée. Avez-vous tourné le dos à l'hérésie ? »

languages.text: “你看起来很安详，你已经放弃异端邪说了吗？”
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: “你看起来很安详，你已经放弃异端邪说了吗？”

languages.text: "Ihr scheint Frieden gefunden zu haben. Habt Ihr der Ketzerei den Rücken gekehrt?"
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr scheint Frieden gefunden zu haben. Habt Ihr der Ketzerei den Rücken gekehrt?"

languages.text: «Parece tranquila. ¿Ha dejado de cometer actos heréticos?».
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: «Parece tranquila. ¿Ha dejado de cometer actos heréticos?».

languages.text: "İç huzura kavuştun gibi. Kâfirliğe tövbe ettin mi?"
languages.original_text: "You seem to be at peace. Have you turned your back on heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "İç huzura kavuştun gibi. Kâfirliğe tövbe ettin mi?"
